snippet: The move against White Wolves Terrorcrew is intended to demonstrate that the authorities will not tolerate agitation against foreigners and migrants.
abstract: Germany bans neo-Nazi group White Wolves Terrorcrew after authorities conduct raids in 10 state and confiscate weapons.
lead_paragraph: The move against White Wolves Terrorcrew is intended to demonstrate that the authorities will not tolerate agitation against foreigners and migrants.

headline.main: Germany Bans Neo-Nazi Group as Far-Right Gains From Migration Crisis
headline.print_headline: Germany Bans Neo-Nazi Group After Raids

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
